response.overview: A team of paranormal investigators from Pensacola, Florida explore a local area known for horrific accidents and murder. They begin by communicating with spirits at historic Chimney Park, and from there, they venture into the darkness at Bay Bluffs. The Second Sight Paranormal team, led by psychic medium, Ericka Boussarhane is lured into the woods by voices on the spirit box. The investigation takes a turn as team members get touched and start hearing voices. They soon find that something evil lives there and doesn't want to be disturbed. Most team members were affected and share their chilling tales of the aftermath. Could they have taken home more than just an experience?
response.title: Cursed Cliffs
